analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/33/0x6f4bea736cc51f6dcfdead130aa3acc9551f6421.sol:

	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/33/0x6f4bea736cc51f6dcfdead130aa3acc9551f6421.sol#117-119)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
